fields.summary: iOS: Feature Request to Support Asset Catalogs

comments.body: This will not be available in 3.3.0. We will revisit it in a future version.

It's worth noting Titanium iOS does support asset catalogs if you have app thinning enable. It will automatically put your images into asset catalogs provided you follow the {{@2x}}, {{@3x}}, {{~iphone}}, and {{~ipad}} tokens.
Closing ticket as duplicate with reference to the above comments.
